DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the effect of vitamin D deficiency on the development of arrhythmia in patients with acute myocardial infarction.
DOC.brief_title: Association of Vitamin D, Parathyroid Hormone and Fibroblast Growth Factor-23 With Infarction-related Arrhythmia in Patients With Acute Myocardial Infarction
DOC.criteria: age â‰¥20 years diagnosed with acute myocardial infarction (confirmed by cardiac enzyme and EKG) subjects who agreed with informed consent previous history of arrhythmia before onset of acute myocardial infarction currently taking antiarrhythmic drugs severe condition of comorbid diseases that can cause more serious effects on patients than acute myocardial infarction does (e.g., cancer, cerebrovascular diseases, acute bleeding etc.)
